name: Submarine2017
description:
Submarine Adventures is a addictive game which simple gameplay that you must tap the screen to move under the water over the obstacles and get away the sharks! to get the presents oo the year!!.The finally to this game is the the best score with the distance and presents recollected.Have a full music and documentation support.

This game have 3 Powerfull power upsKillall(invencible) powerup(rapid) magnet(magnetic coins and stars)
